entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Validate package IDs specified via the #:package directive #47991
  • Align #:package syntax with CLI for specifying package ID and version #47990
  • dotnet nuget why doesn't spot existence of dependency #47982
  • Support package@version syntax in `dotnet package add` #47981
  • Expand/standardize usage of package@version syntax across the .NET CLI #47980

Closed

  • Prevent Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Internal.Assets from being restored when not needed #46165
  • Bug fix rsn #47962
  • No templates list when execute the dotnet new list command #47928

PullRequests

Created

  • dotnet CLI: "Use primary constructor" #47998
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Sign and harden pkgs #47996
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet CLI: More cleanup via VS tools #47995
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • skip making archives for inner loop #47993
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make version identification slightly better #47987
    untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47986
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve MTP dotnet test exit code messages #47979
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use Roslyn to parse directives in file-based programs #47978
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Use TargetArchitecture and TargetRid properties #47977
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • allow @ syntax for package versions in package add #47961
    untriaged, Area-CLI

Merged

  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 10.0.100-preview.4.25178.1 #47988
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove SB test exception for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Internal.Assets package #47984
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid crash when no profile contains 'Project' command #47953
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Shorten path to IntermediateSdkInstallerOutputPath #47983
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #47976
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improves workaround for MacOS file watching quirks #47926
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Remove summary when failing, and double space #47872
    Area-dotnet test, untriaged
  • Add Third Party Notices Template to Source Mappings #47058
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47944
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove EnableDefenderForLinux 1ES PT feature flag #47959
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve pruned package data loading and handling #46898
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • `dotnet package list` command should restore first #47873
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move in-vertical manifest merging to new arcade package #47881
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [SBRP Usage Report] Add target pack support and scan project.assets.json files for package downloads #47916
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Make all the properties in StaticWebAssetEndpoint lazy #47833
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Use Arcade's publishing logic to publish a given VMR vertical #47076
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Make it possible to prep other RIDs and architectures #47956
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove unnecessary CA2022 suppressions #47904
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Simplify exit code logic for dotnet test (MTP) and consider no results correctly as "zero tests ran" #47874
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [ApiDiff] Implementation of the new ApiDiff that reuses GenAPI features #46425
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fixes #44839 to unblock runtime when changes TFMs #47960
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Include only PackageReferences included at runtime in deps.json #46218
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Move generating implicit framework defines to a target. #45696
    Area-NetSDK
